sentence.Network_en: Elliott crossed the finish line just half a second behind his adversary.

sentence.Network_en: He crossed out "Screenplay" and put "Written by" instead.
sentence.Network_cn: 他划掉了“编剧”二字，改为“作者”。

sentence.Network_en: She sank into an armchair and crossed her legs.
sentence.Network_cn: 她坐到一把扶手椅上，跷起了二郎腿。

相声相声（Cross talk）一种民间说唱曲艺。相声艺术源于华北，流行于京津冀，普及于全国及海内外，始于明清，盛于当代。
